attributes.action: Make Hoseasons Refund Customers Who Have Had Holidays Cancelled Due To COVID 19
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of customers are disgruntled at Hoseasons as a result of their policy on cancelled holidays due to COVID 19. Hoseasons are insisting customers rebook or have their Hoseasons account credited to the value of the holiday. Many people are unable to rebook due to issues all getting leave at the same time or maybe the holiday was booked for a special occasion. Hoseasons should refund anyone who has been affected by the Coronavirus outbreak
attributes.background: Hoseasons have refused to refund customers who’s bookings have been cancelled as a result of COVID 19. They should be made to refund these customers as the holidays they paid for are not being provided.

rejection.details:
Arrangements for refunding, changing or rebooking travel are a matter for individual airlines and travel agents, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse money lost due to covid-19 travel cancellations, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
